enriched.description: Searchable. True if the result includes data from the Endpoint Standard product. Not present if false.  Requires Endpoint Standard

hash.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Aggregate set of MD5 and SHA-256 hashes associated with the process (including childproc_hash, crossproc_hash, filemod_hash, modload_hash, process_hash); enables one-step search for any matches on the specified hashes

ttp.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Patterns of behavior (i.e. tactics, techniques, procedures) associated with specific threat actor(s) attributed to events of the process
